title: (x) Font used on martosgallery.com - modified Cholla Wide {Rainer}
content:
Hi

there is someone who know what fonts is used on this site: [http://www.martosgallery.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019181423/http:/www.martosgallery.com/ "http://www.martosgallery.com/") ?

Thanks in advance
author: giulianovelli

comments.content:
Considering [this PDF](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019181423/http:/www.martosgallery.com/exhibitions/2010-02-04_ben-berlow-graham-caldwell/press-release/) from the site and watching at the address in it (the font isn't embedded) it looks like a cleaned version (especially in the unique R) of [Cholla Wide](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019181423/http:/www.identifont.com/show?JXA) from Sybille Hagmann.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019181423im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Gallery_6089.png)
